languages.text: "Ты можешь служить Человечеству, оставаясь собой. Разве жестянка способна заменить истинного административного служителя с огнем в груди?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты можешь служить Человечеству, оставаясь собой. Разве жестянка способна заменить истинного административного служителя с огнем в груди?"

languages.text: "You can serve Humanity while remaining as you are. Could a servitor replace a true administrative officer who is passionate about his work?"
languages.original_text: "Ты можешь служить Человечеству, оставаясь собой. Разве жестянка способна заменить истинного административного служителя с огнем в груди?"

traits.locale_text: "You can serve Humanity while remaining as you are. Could a servitor replace a true administrative officer who is passionate about his work?"
"You can serve Humanity while remaining as you are. Could a servitor replace a true administrative officer who is passionate about his work?"
"You can serve Humanity while remaining as you are. Could a servitor replace a true administrative officer who is passionate about his work?"
"You can serve Humanity while remaining as you are. Could a servitor replace a true administrative officer who is passionate about his work?"

languages.text: “你可以继续以人类的身份来为人类服务。机仆哪能替代得了对工作充满热情的内政官员呢？”
languages.original_text: "You can serve Humanity while remaining as you are. Could a servitor replace a true administrative officer who is passionate about his work?"

traits.locale_text: “你可以继续以人类的身份来为人类服务。奴工哪能替代得了对工作充满热情的内政官员呢？”

languages.text: «Puede servir a la Humanidad en su forma actual. ¿Acaso podría un servidor reemplazar a un auténtico oficial administrativo con pasión por su trabajo?».
languages.original_text: "You can serve Humanity while remaining as you are. Could a servitor replace a true administrative officer who is passionate about his work?"

traits.locale_text: «Puede servir a la Humanidad en su forma actual. ¿Acaso podría un servidor reemplazar a un auténtico oficial administrativo con pasión por su trabajo?».

languages.text: 「今のままでも人類に貢献することはできる。自身の仕事に情熱を持つ本物の行政官に、サーヴィターは取って代われるだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "You can serve Humanity while remaining as you are. Could a servitor replace a true administrative officer who is passionate about his work?"

traits.locale_text: 「今のままでも人類に貢献することはできる。自身の仕事に情熱を持つ本物の行政官に、サーヴィターは取って代われるだろうか？」

languages.text: "Ihr dient der Menschheit mehr, wenn Ihr bleibt, wie Ihr seid. Könnte ein Servitor einen wahren Verwaltungsexperten, der seine Arbeit mit Leidenschaft verrichtet, wirklich ersetzen?"
languages.original_text: "You can serve Humanity while remaining as you are. Could a servitor replace a true administrative officer who is passionate about his work?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr dient der Menschheit mehr, wenn Ihr bleibt, wie Ihr seid. Könnte ein Servitor einen wahren Verwaltungsexperten, der seine Arbeit mit Leidenschaft verrichtet, wirklich ersetzen?"

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas besoin de changer pour continuer à servir l'humanité. Un servitor pourrait-il remplacer un officier administratif digne de ce nom, qui se passionne pour son travail ? »
languages.original_text: "You can serve Humanity while remaining as you are. Could a servitor replace a true administrative officer who is passionate about his work?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas besoin de changer pour continuer à servir l'humanité. Un servitor pourrait-il remplacer un officier administratif digne de ce nom, qui se passionne pour son travail ? »

languages.text: "Şu anki hâlinle de İnsanlığa hizmet edebilirsin. İşine tutkuyla bağlı, hakiki bir memurun yerini hizmetörlerin aldığı nerede görülmüş?"
languages.original_text: "You can serve Humanity while remaining as you are. Could a servitor replace a true administrative officer who is passionate about his work?"

traits.locale_text: "Şu anki hâlinle de İnsanlığa hizmet edebilirsin. İşine tutkuyla bağlı, hakiki bir memurun yerini servitörlerin aldığı nerede görülmüş?"
